1900240.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900240
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 001
1900240.text: Anas ibn Malik said: "The hair of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) came down to the middle of his ears.”

1900250.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900250
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 002
1900250.text: 'A’isha said: "I used to perform the major ritual ablution, I and Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) from a single basin, and he had hair above the shoulder level and below the earlobes.”

1900260.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900260
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 003
1900260.text: Al-Bara’ ibn 'Azib said: “Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) was of medium height, broad-shouldered, and the hair of his head touched the lobes of his ears.”

1900270.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900270
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 004
1900270.text: Qatada said: “I said to Anas: ‘How was the hair of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace)?' He replied: 'It was neither crisply curled nor lank. His hair used to reach the lobes of his ears'.”

1900280.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900280
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 005
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 005
1900280.text: Umm Hani bint 'Ali ibn Talib said: "Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) arrived boldly at Mecca, and he had four braids of hair.”

1900290.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900290
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 006
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 006
1900290.text: Anas said: "The hair of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) was down to the middle parts of his ears.”

1900300.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900300
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 007
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 007
1900300.text: Ibn 'Abbas said: “Allah’s Messenger(Allah bless him and give him peace) used to let his hair hang down [over his face], whereas the polytheists used to part the hair of their heads. The People of the Scripture also used to let the hair of their heads hang down, and he used favor emulating the People of the Scripture with respect to things about which nothing was commanded, but Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) then parted the hair of his head.”

1900310.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900310
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 008
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 008
1900310.text: Umm Hani said: "I saw Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) with four braids of hair.”
